full_text: EI iw 2020/KER/891 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.B.SURESH KUMAR WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Crl.MC.No.9283 OF 2019 (A) AGAINST THE ORDER IN ST 2268/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS, ALATHUR CRIME NO.1637/2017 OF VADAKKANCHERRY POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD PETITIONERS/ACCUSED 1 & 2: 1 SURESH, AGED 46 YEARS, S/O. MANI, KAKKODE HOUSE, ELAVAMPADAM, KIZHAKKENCHERRY, ALATHUR, PALAKKAD DISTRICT 678 543. 2 VISHNU K.S, AGED 19 YEARS, S/O. SURESH, KAKKODE HOUSE, ELAVAMPADAM, KIZHAKKENCHERRY, ALATHUR, PALAKKAD DISTRICT 678 543. BY ADVS. SRI.SAIJO HASSAN SRI.BENOJ C AUGUSTIN SRI.RAFEEK. V.K. SRI.U.M.HASSAN SMT. P. PARVATHY SMT.SURYA P SHAJI RESPONDENTS /COMPLAINANTS : 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI 682 031 2 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, VADAKKENCHERRY POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD DISTRICT 678 683. KOYU, KAKKODE HOUSE, ELAVAMPADAM, KIZHAKKENCHERRY, ALATHUR, PALAKKAD DISTRICT 678 543. 5 ANJALI, AGED 32 YEARS, W/O. BHAVADASAN, KAKKODE HOUSE, ELAVAMPADAM, KIZHAKKENCHERRY, ALATHUR, PALAKKAD DISTRICT 678 543. R3-5 BY ADV. SMT.S.LEKHA SRI.T.R.RENJITH PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Ege el aa 2020/KER/891 Crl.M.C. No.9283 of 2019 3 Cri.M.C.No.9283 of 2019 ORDER This is a proceedings instituted under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for quashing Annexure - 2 final report and all further proceedings pursuant thereto now pending as ST No.2268 of 2018 on the files of the Court of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Alathur. 2. The petitioners are accused Nos.1 and 2 in the said case. The case was one instituted at the instance of the third respondent under Sections 294(b), 447 and 323 read with Section 34 of the Indian Penal Code. 3. Respondents 3 to 5 are the victims of the aforesaid crime. It is seen that respondents 3 to 5 had settled their disputes with the petitioners and affidavits to that effect have been produced as Annexures 3 to 5. 4. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners, the learned Public Prosecutor as also the learned counsel for respondents 3 to 5. 2020/KER/891 Crl.M.C. No.9283 of 2019 4 5. In the light of the decisions of the Apex Court in Gian singh v. State of Punjab, (2012) 10 SCC 303, insofar as the offences alleged against the accused in the case are only offences punishable under Sections 294(b), 447 and 323 read with Section 34 of the Indian Penal Code, | am of the view that this is an appropriate case where this court has to invoke the jurisdiction under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure to quash the proceedings against the petitioners. In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-2 final report and all further proceedings pursuant thereto against the petitioners pending as ST No.2268 of 2018 on the files of the Court of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Alathur are quashed. Sd/- P.B.SURESH KUMAR, JUDGE. YKB Ci} ia 2020/KER/891 Cril.M.C. No.9283 of 2019 5 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 FREE COPY OF THE FIR ANNEXURE 2 TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT. ANNEXURE 3 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY 3RD RESPONDENT DATED 18.12.2019. ANNEXURE 4 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY ATH RESPONDENT DATED 18.12.2019. ANNEXURE 5 TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT FIELD BY 5TH RESPONDENT DATED 18.12.2019. RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE
